name: Slime Quest (Pepontown)
description:
is adventure game, in which you play as a slime :) You will encounter various scary monsters in this adventure, but once you defeat enough of them - you will be able to shapeshift into the killed enemy and gain their unique abilities.
There are also various quests, which will ensure that you will follow the progression in correct order and won't miss out on anything.

Project is built on Unity and works on Windows.

This game is prototype

Controls:

Movement - wasd

Atack/Special ability - Mouse1

Interact - Spacebar

Shapeshift - 1-9 buttons

Inventory - I

Quest Menu - J

Minimap - M

Save Game - V

Load Game - B

Delete Save File - N
